posts.post_content:
You have one of the finest pair of eyes in the hobby
You have a distinguished collection of high grade
rare type cards and post cards.
You are willing to sell your items without any hassle,
and expect to command fair market value+++

This year alone we have secured 12 items from BST.
Whilst others talk or attempt to negotiate down for the
premiere items, we are ready to step up to the plate
and send the cash your way.

Right Now we are actively seeking:

1. G&B Gum SGC 5 or better
2. Yum Yum (photos only) SGC 5 or better
3. AWH Caramels SGC 5 or better
4. E 103- any non- HOF SGC/PSA 6 or better
5. E 104 SGC/PSA 5 or better
6. E 106 SGC/PSA 6 or better
7. E 222 SGC/PSA 5 or better
8. E 300 SGC/PSA 7 or better (we have 3 -send list)
9. T 204 PSA 8- we have 2 -send list
10. T 216- SGC/PSA 6 or better
11. T 227 - PSA SGC 7 or better
12. Stevens Firearms- SGC/PSA 5 or better
13. Lections - SGC/PSA 5 or better
14 George Miller Candy- PSA 6 or better- have 5 -send list
15. Topps 1958 - Ryne Duren PSA 8- will pay top dollar



Please write in confidence to

Bruce Dorskind
America's Premier Collector of Rare Type
[url]bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com[/url]


Help Us Fill "America's Toughest Want List"
